Plans.leave_heading: Not sure you want to stay with Morphic?
Plans.leave_text:
If you no longer want to manage your group, you can close it. Once the group is closed, all of
          your group members will lose there personalizations. Each person will see the basic Morphic Bar.

ResetPassword.success: Instructions to recover your password have been emailed to you.

getting-started.link:
30 Second Tutorial:
Getting Started with the Customization Tool

text: Click the @:(MembersList.add-member_button) button. Then click @:(MembersList.add-bar_button) for that person.
The MorphicBar you selected appears in the middle section of the screen.
It looks the way it might look on a computer.
The right column lists different buttons you can add.
Add buttons by clicking or dragging.
Do you want to make changes to a button?
Click a button on the bar and make your changes.
Step 5: Pushing the bar to the user
When you like how the bar looks, push it to the user and it will appear on the user’s computer.
When you are done, select another bar or just close the tool.
You can come back and make changes at any time.

getting-started.title: Tutorial: Getting started with Morphic Plus
